title: Drawing, Design for Writing Desk Built into Alcove, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Writing Desk Built into Alcove
medium: Pen and black ink on thin cream paper
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink bottom right: WRITING TABLE / (photograph case over) / in Recess in lounging room, and in graphite along right side of design, explanatory notes with arrows pointing to various elements of design
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Writing desk in built-in niche; front has four small horizontal drawers on either side of open center; single vertical drawer set into both canted front corners; writing utensils, vase of flowers, and book on top; above, four vertical cupboard drawers supported by spandrels and with inlaid ornament.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Writing Desk Built into Alcove, 1900–05. Pen and black ink on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-19
